listOfRules.title: Assault on a Civilian
listOfRules.description: Causing Bodily Enjury to civilian.

listOfRules.title: Assault on a Leo
listOfRules.description: Causing Bodily Enjury to a police officer.

listOfRules.title: Attempt of Murder of a Civilian
listOfRules.description: A Suspect has tried to kill a civilian.

listOfRules.title: Attempt of Murder of a Leo
listOfRules.description: A Suspect has tried to kill a Leo.

listOfRules.title: Murder of a Civilian
listOfRules.description: A suspect has killed a civilian.

listOfRules.title: Murder of a LEO
listOfRules.description: A suspect has killed a Leo.

listOfRules.title: Kidnapping of a Civilian
listOfRules.description: A suspect has kidnapped a civilian.

listOfRules.title: Kidnapping of a LEO
listOfRules.description: A suspect has kidnapped a Leo.

listOfRules.title: Robbery of a Bank
listOfRules.description: A suspect robbed a bank.

listOfRules.title: Robbery of a Store/Jewellery Store
listOfRules.description: A suspect has robbed a store or a jewellery store.

listOfRules.title: Manslaughter
listOfRules.description: A suspect has killed a Leo.

listOfRules.title: Vehicle Manslaughter
listOfRules.description: A suspect has killed a Leo.

listOfRules.title: Grand Theft Auto
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught stealing vehicle.

listOfRules.title: Hit And Run
listOfRules.description: A suspect has hit a person with thier vehicle and driven away.

listOfRules.title: Possession of Marijuana with Intent to Distribute
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 1 or more packs of Marijuana.

listOfRules.title: Drug Trafficking of Class B
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 20 or more packs of Marijuana.

listOfRules.title: Drug Trafficking of Class C
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 1 or more leaves of Cannabis.

listOfRules.title: Possession of Narcotics
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 1 pack of 28g of Bag Of Cocain.

listOfRules.title: Possession of Narcotics
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 1 or more leaves of Cocain.

listOfRules.title: Drug Trafficking of Class A
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been caught with 10 or more Bags of Cocain.

listOfRules.title: Unlawful Discharge of Firearms
listOfRules.description: A suspect has discharged his firearms unlawfully.

listOfRules.title: Brandishing a Weapon in City Limits
listOfRules.description: A suspect has their licensed firearm out within city limits.

listOfRules.title: Possessing Weapon without License
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been found possessing a weapon without license.

listOfRules.title: Money Laundering
listOfRules.description: A suspect has been found laundering/cleaning dirty money or crime related money.

listOfRules.title: Fleeing and Evading
listOfRules.description: Suspect was fleeing and evading from a law enforcement officer.

listOfRules.title: Reckless Endagerment
listOfRules.description: A Suspect has others in a significant amount of danger with no reagrad for others safety.

listOfRules.title: Refusing a Lawful Command
listOfRules.description: Suspect is refusing to perform lawful command (eg, not allowing to do search after caught in crime).

listOfRules.title: Fraud
listOfRules.description: Suspect is scamming or has scammed another civilians.

listOfRules.title: Bribery
listOfRules.description: Suspect has offered money or valuable goods in exchange for a reduced sentence.

listOfRules.title: Vandalism
listOfRules.description: Suspect has done destroyed or damaged public or private property.

listOfRules.title: Driving Under the Influence
listOfRules.description: Suspect has been caught driving a vehicle while drunk or on drug.

listOfRules.title: Reckless Driving
listOfRules.description: Suspect is driving a vehicle in a way that endangers himself and the public.

listOfRules.title: Joy Riding
listOfRules.description: Suspect is driving a vehicle recklessly and they do not have proof of vehicle ownership.

listOfRules.title: Driving Illegal Vehicle
listOfRules.description: Suspect is driving a vehicle which lacks number plate.

listOfRules.title: Verbal Threats of a Civilian
listOfRules.description: Suspect is verbally threatening harm to a civilian (eg. When i get out i will kill you.

listOfRules.title: Verbal Threats of an LEO
listOfRules.description: Suspect is verbally threatening harm to a LEO (eg. When i get out i will kill you).

listOfRules.title: Disturbing the Peace
listOfRules.description: Suspect is causing excessively loud noise or engaging in fight.

listOfRules.title: Destruction of State or Private Property
listOfRules.description: Suspect has destroyed or damaged state or private property.

listOfRules.title: Tresspassing
listOfRules.description: Suspect has entered a property wihtout effective consent of owner.

listOfRules.title: Obstruction of Justice
listOfRules.description: Suspect was obstructing justice by blocking leos cars in a pursuit or not letting them do job.

listOfRules.title: Public Intoxication
listOfRules.description: Being Drunk in Public.

listOfRules.title: Insult towards Civilians
listOfRules.description: Being Drunk in Public.

listOfRules.title: Hit n Run
listOfRules.description: Hit n Run description
